```py
-- Joining two tables using SQL
SELECT * FROM Customer C
JOIN Orders O
ON C.ID = O.Customer
```

```py
-- Find total sales for each customer and product in 2022
SELECT c.name, p.name, s.sum(s.Revenue) FROM Sales s
JOIN Customer s
ON c.Key = s.CustomerKey
JOIN Product p
ON p.Key = s.ProductKey
JOIN Time t
ON t.Key = s.TimeKey
GROUP BY 1, 2
WHERE t.Year = '2023'
```
